com.stripe.stripeterminal

Interface ReaderInputListener


  • public interface ReaderInputListener
    The ReaderInputListener should be implemented to handle events from the reader that occur while accepting input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBeginWaitingForReaderInput(ReaderInputOptions options)
      This method is called when the reader begins waiting for input.
      void onRequestReaderInputPrompt(ReaderInputPrompt prompt)
      This method is called to request that a prompt be displayed in your app.

    • Method Detail

      • onBeginWaitingForReaderInput

        void onBeginWaitingForReaderInput(@Nonnull
                                  ReaderInputOptions options)
        This method is called when the reader begins waiting for input. Your app should prompt the customer to present a source using one of the given input options. If the reader emits a prompt, the onRequestReaderInputPrompt(com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderInputPrompt) method will be called. Call ReaderInputOptions.toString() to get a user facing string for the input options.
        Parameters:
        options - The input options the reader is prepared to accept.

      • onRequestReaderInputPrompt

        void onRequestReaderInputPrompt(@Nonnull
                                ReaderInputPrompt prompt)
        This method is called to request that a prompt be displayed in your app. For example, if the prompt is SWIPE_CARD, your app should instruct the user to present the card again by swiping it. Call ReaderInputPrompt.toString() to get a user facing string for the prompt.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The input prompt to display to the user.
